**What's the deal?**
Well, we dropped the ball on BF/CM deals. 
We enjoyed our families and friends company and we hope you all did as well!
So we're going to try to make up for it. We're going to do things a bit differently this time though.

Same as last time! Don't be a jerk and don't have three letter agencies knocking at my door haha.

**Here's the deal!**
We're going to be giving away 2 XS-NVMe-VPSes with a few requirements
Atleast 15 posts on LET
Account age of 3 months
What do you plan on using it for?
Pick a number between 1-1000

Closest two numbers win (ran through random.org), if two people pick the same numbers then we'll take what you've listed to use it for and put it up to a vote!
MUST pass fraud check, if not I'll run the pick again.
Draw will run Dec 3rd @ 11PM EST
